articles.title: Actor Rose Byrne named Harvard’s Hasty Pudding Woman of the Year
articles.description:
Fresh off her Golden Globe Award win and Oscar nomination for the leading role in “If I Had Legs I’d Kick You," Byrne will be honored Feb. 13 with a parade through the streets of Cambridge, Massachusetts.
